targets.query: SELECT last("cpu_percent") AS "CPU", last("mem_percent") AS "RAM", last("pid") AS "PID", last("uptime") AS "uptime" FROM "proc_stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "command" fill(none) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT mean("cpu_percent") FROM "proc_stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "command", "user" fill(null)
